We've achieved a milestone in the River Hull scheme as 3,300m of new piled walls are now constructed @BAMNuttall @MottMacDonald https://t.co/eqNv8wMwH7

tweets.text: @CazGraham1 @SCRiversTrust @EnvAgencyNW @lakelandfarmvc Very technical!
@catchmentdesign @SCRiversTrust @EnvAgencyNW @lakelandfarmvc Is a Kerplunk a technical term? or have you invented them!üòÇ

They can do this by properly funding the @EnvAgency, committing to ending sewage discharges into our rivers, and by not watering down environmental regulations when we so desperately need them.

Watch my full contribution here: https://t.co/a0zwUZpqll

ENDS

Big team effort building 'Kerplunks' in a very wet & cold #lakedistrictnationalpark above Staveley today. On site dynamic design emulates natural log jam type structures to #slowtheflow. Project for @SCRiversTrust & @EnvAgencyNW with massive support from @lakelandfarmvc  #nfm https://t.co/pIgB1QvoZ0
